channel.description: Welcome to CIS 527 Enterprise Systems Administration Welcome to CC 510 Computer Systems Administration Russell Feldhausen (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2213 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Email & Ed Discussion Preferred Teaching Assistant Josh Barron - jrbarron22 AT ksu DOT edu Communication Ed Discussion - Course Questions, Discussions, etc Email - Personal Issues, Grading Questions, To-dos, etc cis527-help@ksuemailprod.onmicrosoft.com Email is official, Ed Discussion is more flexible Content Credits Seth Galitzer - sgsax AT ksu DOT edu Many Previous TAs & Students Course Structure 7 Lab Modules + Final Project Gated - Must Complete in Order ==One Module Due Every 2 Weeks== Can Work Ahead At Your Own Pace Interactive Lab Grading Complete by Finals Week Module 0 - Course Introduction Navigating Canvas & YouTube Syllabus Introduce Yourself! 0 - Course Readiness Quiz Extra Credit - Bug Bounty & Helping Hands Syllabus Contract Between Teacher & Student Read Carefully Ask Questions Changes Highlighted Subject to Change Grading 70% Lab Assignments (10% Each) 10% Quizzes (0.66% Each) 10% Discussions (2% Each) 10% Final Project Some Extra Credit Available (Bug Bounty) Standard 90-80-70-60 grading scale
